name: Buggin' Out
description:
The Beastie Urgent Grabbing Squad (B.U.G.S.) is an intergalactic rapid response body for catching and removing deadly bugs infesting different planets. Your mission is to clear bugs out of an infested city and make it to the end platform before time runs out! But beware, these bugs are known to cause some strange, "glitchy" effects. Explore the city, figure out the effects of the different types of bugs, and use them to your advantage in this fun 3D platformer!

Controls:

Analog or Dpad : Movement

X : Jump

O: Use Net

L/R : Rotate Camera

Start : Pause

Dpad : Navigate Menus
